data.name: 100% Orange Juice - Halena & Cook Character Pack
data.detailed_description:
This Extra Character Pack for 100% Orange Juice adds 2 new playable characters from developer Orange_Juice - Cook and Halena, as well as character and announcer voices for them!

Cook & Halena Character Pack includes

  • Halena, the great guide with every map of the world in her head (Voice: Kahara Moe)
  • Cook, her winged guide partner who can always find her destination (Voice: Kanemoto Hisako)
  • New, unique Hyper Cards for both characters to bring chaos to the battlefield with!
  • New music tracks play as Cook and Halena's themes

The new characters are designed by Orange_Juice's original staff for the game's English Steam release, with character art by Hono and hyper card art by Tsukino.

data.short_description: This Extra Character Pack for 100% Orange Juice adds 2 new playable characters from developer Orange_Juice - Cook and Halena, as well as character and announcer voices for them!
data.supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 2.0GHz or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Sound Card: DirectSound compatible sound card
